com.facebook.buck.java

Class Jsr199Javac

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.java.Jsr199Javac
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Javac, RuleKeyAppendable

    public class Jsr199Javac
extends java.lang.Object
implements Javac
    Command used to compile java libraries with a variety of ways to handle dependencies.

    If buildDependencies is set to BuildDependencies.FIRST_ORDER_ONLY, this class will invoke javac using declaredClasspathEntries for the classpath. If buildDependencies is set to BuildDependencies.TRANSITIVE, this class will invoke javac using transitiveClasspathEntries for the classpath. If buildDependencies is set to BuildDependencies.WARN_ON_TRANSITIVE, this class will first compile using declaredClasspathEntries, and should that fail fall back to transitiveClasspathEntries but warn the developer about which dependencies were in the transitive classpath but not in the declared classpath.
